hero.title: 欢迎来到 Soloman IBC
hero.description: 我们是一家为客户提供服务的公司。

founder.title: 創始人簡介
founder.name: 我是蘇萊曼
founder.graduation: 索樂萬調查及商業顧問有限公司的創始人，擁有超過12年的跨國經驗與深厚的專業背景。我在香港完成中學教育，後赴英國修讀會計專業，並取得英國私家偵探訓練證書、高級理財顧問證書及美國認證財務顧問證書。
founder.experience: 畢業後，我回到香港，先後從事理財顧問及外貿行業，累積了豐富的實戰經驗。在處理中港臺及中東、歐洲、非洲等地的商業案例中，我展現了卓越的洞察力與解決問題的能力。因對真相探索的熱忱，我投身偵探行業，從老牌偵探社的前線調查員一路晉升為全港最大規模偵探社的高級調查顧問，在該領域深耕多年。
founder.relocating: 移居英國後，我希望以索樂萬調查及商業顧問有限公司為平台，將我的專業知識與跨文化經驗服務於更多客戶。作為一名熱愛偵探工作的專業人士，我堅信，每一件事情的表面之下都可能隱藏著鮮為人知的真相。我的使命是以專業、誠信和創新的方式，為客戶提供量身定制的解決方案，解決問題的同時實現雙贏，並不斷追求卓越。

professionalTeam.title: 專業團隊
professionalTeam.description: 我們的團隊由來自香港及英國的多領域專家組成，擁有深厚的行業背景與豐富的實踐經驗：

list.title: 稅務專家
list.description: 提供全面的財務與稅務合規建議，確保每筆交易與調查在稅務上都穩妥無虞。

list.title: 貿易專家
list.description: 精通國際貿易法規及市場分析，為客戶提供高效的跨境商業解決方案。

list.title: 法律專家
list.description: 確保每個調查與顧問項目合法合規，並提供全面的法律支持。

list.title: 專業偵探團隊
list.description: 熟練掌握調查技術，專注於保密性和高效執行，為客戶揭示事實真相。

professionalTeam.excellence: 我們擅長處理跨境調查與商業項目，結合本地專業知識與國際視野，提供量身定制的解決方案，幫助客戶在全球化背景下應對挑戰。

list.title: 保密與信任
list.description: 每位客戶的隱私和數據安全始終是我們的首要考量。我們承諾以最高標準保護您的信息，確保調查過程絕對保密。

list.title: 量身定制的解決方案
list.description: 我們深知每位客戶的需求各不相同。因此，我們根據具體情況為您設計專屬的調查計劃與顧問服務，確保結果精準且切合實際。

list.title: 專業與效率
list.description: 憑藉超過12年的行業經驗和跨國專業技能，我們能夠快速診斷問題並提供高效的解決方案，助您掌握先機，贏得成功。

list.title: 合法與合規的全方位支持
list.description: 我們在合法合規的框架下，協助客戶處理多樣化的事務，成為您值得信賴的生活與商業夥伴。

blog.title: 最新见解和新闻
blog.description: 香港商业、金融和企业服务的专家分析和更新

services_investigation.title: Investigation Services
services_investigation.description: We provide comprehensive investigations and business consulting services to help clients succeed in international markets.
services_investigation.conclusion: Each service can be tailored to meet the specific needs of our clients, ensuring precise and detailed investigation results. We prioritize privacy and compliance, guaranteeing a secure and reliable process. For further inquiries or consultations, feel free to contact us!

corporate.title: Corporate Investigations
corporate.description: We provide comprehensive investigations and business consulting services to help clients succeed in international markets.
corporate.conclusion: Each service can be tailored to meet the specific needs of our clients, ensuring precise and detailed investigation results. We prioritize privacy and compliance, guaranteeing a secure and reliable process. For further inquiries or consultations, feel free to contact us!

list.title: Company Background
list.description: Thorough investigation of company history and operations
features: Investigate the company's history, registration details, and scope of operations.
Verify if the company has a history of illegal operations, contract breaches, or other negative records.
Analyze the company’s financial condition and market reputation.

list.title: Property Investigation
list.description: Detailed verification of property-related matters
features: Verify property ownership, leasing arrangements, and any legal disputes
Ensure the authenticity and compliance of property transactions
Investigate property history to identify potential risks

list.title: Background Investigation
list.description: Comprehensive background checks on key personnel
features: Conduct thorough identity checks on management, shareholders, or business partners
Identify hidden conflicts of interest or unethical business practices

list.title: Asset Investigation
list.description: Detailed assessment of company assets
features: Assess the company’s assets, including fixed and liquid assets
Locate hidden or transferred assets, especially in litigation cases

list.title: Mystery Shopping
list.description: Professional service quality evaluation
features: Deploy professional mystery shoppers to evaluate service quality
Analyze customer experiences and provide recommendations for improvement to enhance brand image

list.title: Marriage Records
list.description: Verification of marital status for risk management
features: Assess legal compliance of the company, including tax, regulatory, and other legal matters
Identify potential legal issues and develop strategies to address them

personal.title: Personal Investigations
personal.description: Discreet and professional investigation services for personal matters and peace of mind

list.title: People Search & Address Investigation
list.description: Verification of marital status for risk management
features: Assist in locating estranged family members, friends, or business partners
Confirm the target's address or latest contact information

list.title: Partner Monitoring
list.description: Professional monitoring services for safety concerns
features: Monitor partner activities for abnormal behavior to address trust or safety concerns
Provide detailed reports to assist in handling relationship issues

list.title: Child Activity Monitoring
list.description: Ensure the safety and well-being of minors
features: Help parents understand the activities and social circles of minors
Address suspected risky behaviors or threats in advance

list.title: Online Dating Background Checks
list.description: Verify the authenticity of online relationships
features: Verify the authenticity and background of online dating partners
Confirm if the individual has undisclosed marital or criminal records

list.title: Life and Death Records
list.description: Official record verification services
features: Confirm the living or deceased status of an individual, particularly in inheritance cases
Verify the authenticity of life or death records for legal purposes

list.title: Bankruptcy Records
list.description: Financial background investigation
features: Investigate an individual's financial background and bankruptcy history
Assess risks associated with financial transactions or partnerships
